description: This is a CloudFormation resource for the first-party AWS::Hooks::LambdaHook.

Role.markdownDescription:
IAM Role ARN

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: arn:.+:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/.+  
Update requires: No interruption

StackName.markdownDescription:
CloudFormation Stack name

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z][-a-zA-Z0-9]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetOperation.description: Which operations should this Hook run against? Resource changes, stacks or change sets.
TargetOperation.markdownDescription:
Which operations should this Hook run against? Resource changes, stacks or change sets.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: RESOURCE | STACK | CHANGE_SET | CLOUD_CONTROL  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetName.description: Type name of hook target. Hook targets are the destination where hooks will be invoked against.
TargetName.markdownDescription:
Type name of hook target. Hook targets are the destination where hooks will be invoked against.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Pattern: ^(?!.*\*\?).*$  
Update requires: No interruption

Action.description: Target actions are the type of operation hooks will be executed at.
Action.markdownDescription:
Target actions are the type of operation hooks will be executed at.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: CREATE | UPDATE | DELETE  
Update requires: No interruption

InvocationPoint.description: Invocation points are the point in provisioning workflow where hooks will be executed.
InvocationPoint.markdownDescription:
Invocation points are the point in provisioning workflow where hooks will be executed.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: PRE_PROVISION  
Update requires: No interruption

HookTarget.description: Hook targets are the destination where hooks will be invoked against.
HookTarget.markdownDescription:
Hook targets are the destination where hooks will be invoked against.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

LambdaFunction.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN), Partial ARN, name, version, or alias of the Lambda function to invoke with this hook.
LambdaFunction.markdownDescription:
Amazon Resource Name (ARN), Partial ARN, name, version, or alias of the Lambda function to invoke with this hook.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 170  
Pattern: (arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*)?:lambda:)?([a-z]{2}(-gov)?(-iso([a-z])?)?-[a-z]+-\d{1}:)?(\d{12}:)?(function:)?([a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)(:(\$LATEST|[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+))?  
Update requires: No interruption

HookStatus.description: Attribute to specify which stacks this hook applies to or should get invoked for
HookStatus.markdownDescription:
Attribute to specify which stacks this hook applies to or should get invoked for

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ENABLED | DISABLED  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetOperations.description: Which operations should this Hook run against? Resource changes, stacks or change sets.
TargetOperations.markdownDescription:
Which operations should this Hook run against? Resource changes, stacks or change sets.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

FailureMode.description: Attribute to specify CloudFormation behavior on hook failure.
FailureMode.markdownDescription:
Attribute to specify CloudFormation behavior on hook failure.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: FAIL | WARN  
Update requires: No interruption

TargetFilters.description: Attribute to specify which targets should invoke the hook

TargetNames.description: List of type names that the hook is going to target

Actions.description: List of actions that the hook is going to target

InvocationPoints.description: List of invocation points that the hook is going to target

TargetFilters.markdownDescription:
Attribute to specify which targets should invoke the hook

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

StackFilters.description: Filters to allow hooks to target specific stack attributes

FilteringCriteria.description: Attribute to specify the filtering behavior. ANY will make the Hook pass if one filter matches. ALL will make the Hook pass if all filters match
FilteringCriteria.markdownDescription:
Attribute to specify the filtering behavior. ANY will make the Hook pass if one filter matches. ALL will make the Hook pass if all filters match

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: ALL | ANY  
Update requires: No interruption

StackNames.description: List of stack names as filters

Include.description: List of stack names that the hook is going to target
Include.markdownDescription:
List of stack names that the hook is going to target

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Exclude.description: List of stack names that the hook is going to be excluded from
Exclude.markdownDescription:
List of stack names that the hook is going to be excluded from

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

StackNames.markdownDescription:
List of stack names as filters

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

StackRoles.description: List of stack roles that are performing the stack operations.

Include.description: List of stack roles that the hook is going to target
Include.markdownDescription:
List of stack roles that the hook is going to target

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Exclude.description: List of stack roles that the hook is going to be excluded from
Exclude.markdownDescription:
List of stack roles that the hook is going to be excluded from

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

StackRoles.markdownDescription:
List of stack roles that are performing the stack operations.

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

StackFilters.markdownDescription:
Filters to allow hooks to target specific stack attributes

---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Alias.description: The typename alias for the hook.
Alias.markdownDescription:
The typename alias for the hook.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^(?!(?i)aws)[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}::[A-Za-z0-9]{2,64}$  
Update requires: Replacement

HookArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the activated hook
HookArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the activated hook

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/hook/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

ExecutionRole.description: The execution role ARN assumed by Hooks to invoke Lambda.
ExecutionRole.markdownDescription:
The execution role ARN assumed by Hooks to invoke Lambda.

---

Required: Yes  
Type:   
Update requires: No interruption

HookArn.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the activated hook
HookArn.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the activated hook

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws[A-Za-z0-9-]{0,64}:cloudformation:[A-Za-z0-9-]{1,64}:([0-9]{12})?:type/hook/.+$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes
